titleStmt.title: Jovis primo die Decembr', 1692, annoque regni Regis & Reginæ, Willielmi & Mariæ ... this court this day taking that divers tradesmen and others have taken upon them an evil practice upon the public exchange ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Fleet Mayor.
Second part of title taken from first three lines of text.
Order forbidding bets on outcome of the war against France.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
